Ewe[edit]

Proper noun[edit]

Dezember

  1. December (month)

Related terms[edit]

  • Dzome

German[edit]

Alternative forms[edit]

  • December (obsolete)
  • Dec., Xber (abbreviation, obsolete)
  • Dez. (abbreviation)

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /deˈtsɛmbɐ/
  • audio
    		(file)
  • Hyphenation: De-zem-ber

Noun[edit]

Dezember m (genitive Dezembers or Dezember, plural Dezember)

  1. December

Luxembourgish[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From German Dezember.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /deˈtsæmbeʀ/, [dəˈt͡sæmbɐ]

Noun[edit]

Dezember m (plural Dezember)

  1. December

See also[edit]

  • (Gregorian calendar months) Mount am Gregorianesche Kalenner; Januar, Februar, Mäerz, Abrëll, Mee, Juni, Juli, August, September, Oktober, November, Dezember (Category: lb:Months)

Pennsylvania German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Compare German Dezember.

Noun[edit]

Dezember m

  1. December (month)
    Synonym: Grischtmunet

Related terms[edit]

Calendar months: Yanuaar/Yenner, Febrewaar/Hanning, Matz, Aprill, Moi, Yuni, Yuli/Tschulei, Aaguscht, Sepdember, Oktower, Nowember, Dezember/Grischtmunet
